response.original_title: Uncle nick and the magic forest- the happy day parade
response.overview: This fun-filled video for children -- featuring Nick Felix, who won acclaim for his work as a choreographer with the Barney the Dinosaur show -- has been given a pared-down presentation for release on DVD. Uncle Nick and the Magic Forest, Volume 2: Happy Day Parade has been transferred to disc in the full-frame aspect ratio of 1.33:1, and the audio has been mastered in Dolby Digital Stereo. The program is in English, with no multiple language options. A gallery of production photos is included as a bonus.
response.title: Uncle nick and the magic forest- the happy day parade
